column5: I will be fishing Lac LaRonge the first week of June. Hopefully the ice will be gone, as we are driving about 30 hours to get there... Will be fishing mainly for walleyes, however I hear the lake trout are also catchable that time of year. Need some advice on how to fish for them....depth, where, troll, stillfish, spoons, spinners what? Please help. any advice is appreciated. thanks Sweed
